title: How to get an S with Yasuo?
body: I have tried so hard to get an S with yasuo, any suggestions? Whenever I carry its always an A+...

replies.body:
Get a premade friend. Have your friend going as Bot, and you as Support. You pick Yasuo, he picks Alistar. Instant S because it will compare you to Yasuo Support, not Yasuo mid or Top.

Is it a dirty way to get it? Yes it is, but that shouldn't be a problem to a Yasuo main.
if you need S with anyone with a stun just play support lol, how i got twisted fate mastery 7 EZ, i also just buy all the items in the shop for supporting too

i love the way u say. its a dirty way to get an S. but that shouldnt be a problem for a yas main. LOOL!! im a yas main, and when I saw that before reading ur joke. I was instantly thinking "thats such a greasy way to get an S and I love it and im gonna do it everytime!"
Hey, I was a filthy Shaco main and got from Mastery 5 to 7 in 6 games, all with at least S-, by playing Shaco mid.

Hi! I have gotten S ranks with Yasuo, and have level 5 mastery with him. It just takes time and skill. Can't give you much more, but be a team player. Don't go for just kills, get objectives too. Getting a Quadra with him also helps :)
LOL i have yasuo mastery lvl6 and i need 1 more token to get him mastery lvl7 can some one help me get out of her its verry hard to get 1 token
OMG SAME XDD
SAMEEEE
Same :D{{champion:157}} {{item:3070}}
ok so i main yasuo this is an S+ game 15-1-7 257 cs
something finally realistic, i'm just checking how much cs in order to get an s+ and it worked! thank you!{{champion:157}}

how  mush they must be
i need a token
i think **250+ **
Silver 4/5 MMR 1200. In a normal as Yasuo mid lane, went 20/3/12 with 248 CS in 39m and took objectives and warded too. A+. wtf gives?
League is fuckin broken. That’s why
Haha u Kidding me? I went 36/7 254 cs and got an s-. I was sooo triggered
Aside from just playing good, your opponent skills will directly affect how you perform. If you luck out and get an "easy" opponent, chance are you will get S .
But not S+ Bc its calculate ur opponents skills u can only get it when ur opponent is skillled and not noobs.I got noob match with 51 kills and still not s+ :D
git gud
Zero deaths,500 kills per game and 1000+ CS.
I got an S- for going 1/0/1, ... so ¯\_(ツ)_/¯.
Ok. Ur dad is the riot ceo comfirmed
I have went 31/17/12 with 411 Cs once and gotten an S-. I think u need around 200-250 Cs plus a decent KDA for S rank.thats what you should shoot for....15/5 as minimum kd and 200-250 Cs try it out
Nah bruh. U gotta get less than like 5 kills
If only you didn't die that many times , easy S+ for sure
3 and 0 is the same as 15 and 5

math wise, sure if ur doing fraction type things. But in league 3 kills gives u enough gold to buy a Zeal. 15 kills gives u around (4500g) probably ur PD and half ur IE, obviously not including the gold from csing and 1g per sec. Im talkin straight gold from kills. Now u have to think. is it worth it to of given an enemy. 5 kills worth of gold (1500) for the 15 kills u got. Or more "wurf" to of gotten 3 kills (900g) but contributed nothing to the enemies builds. Now ofc 5 deaths is worse than 0, but I would say it is "wurf" to of died 5 times for an extra 12 kills. Because Yasuo scales alot better than almost everyone else with his first 2 items.
The point I was making is that it's easier to get an s by going 3 and 0 or 3 and 1 rather than 15 and 5

I just went 20/4/12 with 248cs, solo drake, about 4 towers and carried my whole team and I got an A????  Not even an A+ I don’t know what the hell I can do better than that? Still need 2 tokens feels like I’m never gonna get it :(

19/4/i forgot assists and 184 cs at 21 minutes in for a s+... get a few objectives aswell

> [{quoted}](name=Ethethan,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=JivnEnFz,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-05-20T03:44:38.427+0000)
>
> I have tried so hard to get an S with yasuo, any suggestions? Whenever I carry its always an A+...

Apply snorkel, tip head forward, roll face over QWER repeatedly.

What will help:
- If against a melee champ try to get as much poke off with your Q
- Farm perfectly up to 6 try to get a level lead and if there is an opportunity to all in go for it with ult.
- Take the enemies raptors to increase your gold, CS and put the enemy jungler behind and essentially waste his time.
u suck
i got 51/1/8 and 336 minions killed,baron solo and dragons solo NO  S+ only an S ..
Get more then 199 farm.
M6 is like the wind, always by my side.... s-

well, last time i got an S is 2 months ago lol, after that i think the system does not want me to achieve level 7, whenever i got 17/4/12 in 30 mins games, a triple kill, 8 killing sprees, 8 towers destroyed and got the first one, slain a baron and highest damage......still get S-. > I have tried so hard to get an S with yasuo, any suggestions? Whenever I carry its always an A+...

> [{quoted}](name=Ethethan,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=JivnEnFz,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-05-20T03:44:38.427+0000)
>
> I have tried so hard to get an S with yasuo, any suggestions? Whenever I carry its always an A+...

Happened to get one today.

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2374710283/211504336?tab=overview

This was a straight S.

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2368814663/211504336?tab=overview

I am pretty sure this stupid game is where I got my S+ on him.

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2371579476/211504336?tab=stats

I want to say this was an S- but I'm not sure.

Basically, probably the most important thing with Yasuo in particular is not dying. Having a good KDA and farm helps, but Yasuo's on average die a lot. So if you manage to carry hard while also dying infrequently or not at all you will probably get an S.
this is only a tip end the game fast get like 15-20 kills and no more then 2 deaths and cs as good as you can in 2 days i went from level 5 to 6 and 1/3 of level 7
the last game i got 22/10/8  and 578cs S+ im lvl7 yasuo ez
27/4/13 178 cs at 24 minutes no S i actually think yasuo is bugged
the last game I played with yasuo I have 24/2/18 and 286 cs but all I got was an A+
I didn't get a S in this match 20/2/3 , 157 cs and 9 towers taken and 2 inhabitors

I got a S+ in this match tho
Hope it helps

32/0/9 , 400 cs in 30 minutes , two pentas , 2 dragons and 1 solo baron
